meanings.definition: A crystalline alkaloid found in tea leaves and coffee beans.
meanings.sent1: Theine is a substance that can be found in tea leaves and coffee beans.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy drinking beverages that contain theine, such as tea and coffee.
meanings.sent3: Theine must be a magical ingredient in tea and coffee, making them so energizing.
meanings.sent4: Theine is like a hidden gem in tea leaves and coffee beans, giving them their stimulating properties.
meanings.sent5: Theine is the secret behind the energy boost you get from drinking tea or coffee.

meanings.definition: A stimulant compound similar to caffeine.
meanings.sent1: After drinking a cup of coffee, I can feel the effects of theine kicking in.
meanings.sent2: Theine is a substance that can help keep you awake and alert.
meanings.sent3: I wonder if theine and caffeine are best friends, always keeping us awake.
meanings.sent4: Theine is like a gentle wake-up call compared to the jolt of caffeine.
meanings.sent5: Theine is the natural pick-me-up found in tea and coffee.
